feed.title: Ark Server Manager Version Feed
feed.subtitle: This is the Ark Server Manager release version feed.

ul.li: Server Status checks - a few code tweaks to the server status checks.
pt-BR Translation file updated.
Server Settings - Rules Section - added bShowCreativeMode setting.
Server Settings - Rules Section - added DestroyTamesOverLevelClamp setting.
RCON Window - Fixed the tribe name missing from the player list.
Server Settings - haved added resizing to all the grids, so the height can be increased/decreased. The height is also remembered, so when you reopen ASM, it will size the grid correctly.
Server Settings - Supply Crate Section - Added indicator icons to each grid row, for better troubleshooting of possible issues.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
zh-CN Translation file updated.
Ragnarok and Valguero gamedata files updated.
pt-BR Translation file updated.
fr-FR Translation file updated.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
Server Settings - Rules Section - Added new Genesis: Part 2 settings, bDisableWorldBuffs, bEnableWorldBuffScaling and WorldBuffScalingEfficacy.

Server Settings - Prevent Transfer Section - Added new section to handle the PreventTransferForClassNames settings. This section can be enabled/disables from the global settings, if you want to management these manually.
Fixed issue when settings Item Stat Clamps.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
pt-BR Translation file updated.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
Fixed a crashing issue when some of the integer entry boxes were cleared of the value.
Server Settings - Rules Section - Added ItemStatClamps settings.
Settings Grids - Added coloring for Genesis: Part 2 resources, engrams and dinos.
Server Update - After server update, added check for version.txt file to read the new version.
Server Settings - Dino Section - Added the AllowFlyerSpeedLeveling setting.
Server Settings - Rules Section - Added new Genesis: Part 2 section.
Server Settings - Rules Section - Expanded Hexegon section with new settings.
Player Levels - Added the new 25 player levels introduced in the Genesis: Part 2 DLC.
Server Settings - Added Peer port field to Administration section. It is set to readonly, as it cannot be changed, but shows the extra port required by the server.
Global Settings - Added option to automatically manage the Public IP, default to True. If disabled, then the Public IP must be updated manually.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
Server Settings - Added MaxHexagonsPerCharacter and HexagonRewardMultiplier setting to the bottom of the Rules section.
Translation files updated.
Defaulted Redirect SteamCmd output to False.
added public ip checks to all server starts.
After profile sync, if automatic management section selected, it will run the schedule update.
translation files updated.
Added new global setting to include Server IP and port to server start alert.
Added server ip and port to the alert message when starting the server.
es-ES Translation file updated.
pt-BR Translation file updated.
Translation files updated.
AllowSharedConnections (Allow Shared Connections) setting - added to the Administration section, Server Settings group.
MaxGateFrameOnSaddles (Max Gateways on Saddles) setting - added to the Rules section, towards the top.
DinoCountMultiplier (Dino Spawns) setting - moved to the Environment section, at the top.
de-DE Translation file updated.
fr-FR Translation file updated.
en-US updated.
de-DE Translation file updated.
es-ES Translation file updated.
ru-RU Translation file updated.
Changed the Difficulty Offset slider, so it does not have a max value.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated. (thanks @shouke)
Added a new Enable Dino Level Progressions checkbox. Allows the ability to only enable player levels, or enable player and dino levels.
Added a new server manager updater check, when performing an upgrade of the server manager.
Added a new directory check when selecting the data directory, to make sure it is not underneath the installation folder.
New tray icon when the server manager starts.
New global setting to Minimize to Tray.
Added a filter button to the filter boxes. Typing in the filter box no longer auto filters, you need to click the filter button to apply/clear the filter.
Added a reload button to the Custom INI sections.
Added a new Custom Engine.ini section. This section is hidden by default, and can be shown using a new option in the global settings.
Updated all grid checkbox columns to align the checkbox properly.
Added None to the active events.
de-DE Translation file updated. (thanks @maxiel)

Changed the shutdown timer alert interval from always 5 minutes, to a varying scale base on remaining time. Eg. 60 minute shutdown timer will only alert at these times - 60, 30, 15, 10, 5, 4 ,3, 2, 1.
Fixed an issue where the Alert message for the server status would send through English only. Changed it so that it will send the translated status instead.
Added Flame Arrow item to Scorched Earth gamedata file.
Dino Section - Dino Imprinting group - Added new BabyImprintAmountMultiplier setting.
Added checkbox for new setting -PublicIPForEpic=, when checked it will add the server args, and uses your public IP address.
Custom Resource Grid - Fixed Custom Harvest Amount Multipliers checkbox so that it is only checked when one or more resource items are in the config file.
Mod id validation fixed, for mod ids of 10 digits or more.
ClampResourceHarvestDamage setting changed to always write to the ini file.
Engrams Grid - fixed the engrams being writing to the config file, when Selected Only is checked.
Global Settings - Shutdown Options - Have added a new setting to disable the online player check when shutting down the server.
Shutdown Window - Have added a new setting to disable the online player check when shutting down the server.
Rules Section - added new PlatformSaddleBuildAreaBoundsMultiplier slider option.
Dino Grid - added new filter textbox, so you can filter the grid with text matching.
Engram Grid - added new filter textbox, so you can filter the grid with text matching.
Resources Grid - added new filter textbox, so you can filter the grid with text matching.
Raw Sockets settings have been removed - will need to manually start/save/stop your servers for the effects to take.
Added new server settings - UseVivox, Crossplay and EpicOnly.
Added Crystal Isles to the official mod list in the gamedata file.
Added extra server port to firewall rule.
Remove the avatar images from the player/rcon list.
Removed the map and total conversion from the profile sync.
Removed all steam related features from PlayerList/Rcon windows.
Fixed loaded EPIC player profiles in PlayerList/Rcon windows.
Removed steam details from Player window.
Changed the Server Files section to be generic.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated. (thanks @shouke)
Mod Details Window - fixed bug when clicking save button.
Engrams Grid - Select All/Unselect All buttons - will use the current filter to only select/unselect the engrams that are visible in the grid.
Crystal Isles gamedata file added - only includes map name.
Changed the logic when reading the config files, when an expected setting is missing from the config file.
Globalisation - added some additional strings to the globalisation files.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Added additional logging when the server is being started.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated. (thanks @shouke)

Server Settings - Administration Section - added a new field for the Active Events. This list is populated from the gamedata files, and can be manually entered if event does not exist in the list. Have included only the main events.
Profile Sync - removed the ports and password from the administration section sync.
Global Settings - changed the workshop cache field to accept 0. When set the zero it will disable to auto refresh, and must be done manually.
Server Settings - Administration section - Moved the Max Players, Idle timeout and Ban URL settings to the Server Settings group.
Globalisation - added some missing strings to the globalisation files.
Survival Evolved gamedata file - added the missing Homestead update engrams and structures.
Ragnarok gamedata file updated. (thanks @depth)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
Aberration - added Tek Sleeping Pod engram and item.
Removed ProfileToolTip from profile file.
Server Settings - Rules Section - added missing TribeSlotReuseCooldown setting.
Global Settings - added new alert message for Outdated mods to the discord plugin.
Out of Date Mods - added new alert message that is sent when the server manager detects a mod is outdated.
Profile Sync Window - have changed the way this window works. You now open on the profile you want to copy from, and you can now select one or more profiles to copy to.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Server Setting Resets - added any missing settings to each reset methods.
Server Setting Syncs - added any missing settings to each sync methods.
New Profile Creation - fixed a bug that causes new profile to use the same profile id.
Setting Directory Permissions - Fixed bug that caused the directory permissions process to fail.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
Deleting profiles - have added dispose call to prevent crash when updating server status.
Deleting profiles - have added null check to dispose call to prevent crash when removing profile.
Server Monitor Shortcut - fixed the shortcut creation, due to new server manager name.
Server Settings - Have added a new Game.ini section. This will allow you to add custom sections to the game.ini file using the server manager.
Added ToolTip to profile label and profile tab that shows the profile name and profile id.
Windows Firewall Management - have replaced the command line code to create the firewall rules with a proper library to create them.
Windows Firewall Management - when you delete a profile it will now attempt to remove the firewall rules.
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Fixed a bug that caused the server manager to crash when creating the server file watchers.
Fixed a bug that caused the server manager to crash when opening the RCON Window or Players List.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
Server Settings - fixed the bug that keeps clearing the EnableAutoDestroyStructures setting.
Rules Section - added new CryopodNerfIncomingDamageMultPercent setting.
Server Manager Profiles - Have changed the name of the profile files to be the profile id. This is to prevent profile name clashes.
Server Manager Profiles - Have removed the config file backups in the profiles folder. These files were never used and a pain to maintain.
Server Manager Logging - All logging now uses the profile id as the folder/filenames.
Server Installation Folder - changed the underlying control so that it displays underscore characters.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Dino Multipliers - Tamed/Add/Affinity - fixed a bug when setting some of these values to 1, will remove them from the config files.
Server Settings - Difficulty Override - fixed bug that would clear the difficulty setting.
Server Settings - EnableCryopodNerf - fixed setting name so it now works.
Main Window - changed the min width to 1024 pixels.
Main Window - rearranged the header section and the buttons.
Profile Sync Window - windows is now resizable.
Slider control - changed the min width of the value field to be smaller.
Player/Dino Max XP Settings - moved these two settings to the Player and Dino Level Progression section.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
RCON Window - Fixed the overlay, so that is can be used again.
Valguero Gamedata File - Fixed the classname of the Deinonychus Saddle. (thanks @jutka)
Rules Section - Tribute Upload Options - have added to new settings - MaxTributeDinos and MaxTributeItems. Both default of 50 and max limit of 200, anything over 200 can cause cluster corruption.
Rules Section - added new server settings - bEnableCryopodNerf, CryopodNerfDuration, and CryopodNerfDamageMult. They are located at the bottom of the rules section.
Switched out the engram list for a grid, to keep consistent with the other sections.
Added last started date/time as tooltip for Status field.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Fixed the Auto-Restart Grace Period interval logic. It should work correctly now.
Global Settings - Auto-Restart section - added a note and fixed the tooltip.
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Server Settings - Dino Section - added missing server setting Mating Speed Multiplier. This has been added to the Dino Breeding Multipliers group near the bottom of the section. (thanks @Norlini)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Global Setting - Added new Auto Restart section with options to enable/disable auto restart grace period.
Starting a Server - when you server is started, it now records the last started time in your profiles.
Auto-Restart - with the grace period option enabled, when the auto-restart process runs it will check if your server was started within the grace period and skip; otherwise it will restart as normal.
RCON Window - added adjustable player list, width is retained.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Player and Dino levels - fix bug when resetting and updating MAX level values.
Rules Section - Added EnableCryoSicknessPVE setting.
Server Monitor Window - added backup and open folder buttons.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
ru-RU Translation file fixed.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
Game Data - fixed a crash when loading with an invalid gamedata file.
Dino Levels - Dino levels now start at level 1, not level 2.
Environment Section - Resource Grid - fixed tooltip on the save button.
Environment Section - Resource Grid - fixed duplicate resource issue when pasting in settings of existing resources, will now overwrite the values, instead of creating new.
Main Window - the main window now stores the height and width of the window.
Main Window - new button (top right corner) to open the new Server Monitor window.
Server Monitor Window - new window that shows all you servers in one form. Allows you to Start, Stop, Update/Verify and open the Player List or RCON Windows.
Server Monitor Window - includes a button to create a shortcut on your desktop that can start the Server Monitor directly, without the server manager.
Global Settings - Shutdown Options - have added an option to enable/disable sending the shutdown message to the game client via RCON.
Shutdown Window - have added an option to enable/disable sending the shutdown message to the game client via RCON.
Shutdown Process - have added logic to send the shutdown message to the game client via RCON, only if the setting is enabled.
Game Data Window - Added a validate button, to validate the user gamedata files.
Game Data Window - Displays the gamedata file in Red if the file is invalid.
Game Data Window - When adding a new gamedata file, will display an error if the file is invalid.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Dialog forms - have fixed an issue where the dialog forms would open behind the current window.
Server Settings - have added error dialogs when trying to add a child record without selecting a parent record first (crafting overrides, map spawner overrides and supply crate overrides).
Server Settings (Engrams section) - will not write OverrideNamedEngramEntries entries to the game.ini file unless one or more default values have changed.
Server Settings (Dino section) - changed the way the sort works for the dino grid.
Server Settings (Engrams section) - added column header tooltips to for more clarity.
Server Settings (Engrams section) - changed the way the sort works for the engrams grid.
Server Settings (Environment section) - changed the way the sort works for the resources grid.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
Dialog forms - have fixed an issue where the dialog forms would open behind the current window.
Server Settings (Engrams section) - added two additional columns to the engrams grid to allow each engram to be automatically unlocked.
Game Data Window - Fixed a bug when clicking the Open GameData Folder button and no gamedata folder exists. It will create the folder and open it.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Main Window - Added Game Data Window button to open a new Game Data window. Button is top right corner next to plugins button.
Game Data Window - A new windows that allows you to manage your game data files.
Global Settings (Advanced) - added an option to enable/disable world save backups being performed when the server shuts down. For those of you who use other backup methods.

Global Settings (Advanced) - added an option to enable/disable server verification after the auto update is done. If enabled, will add extra time when the auto update is run and your server is updated.

Server Settings (Dinos section) - have split the bForceCanRideFliers setting into two settings - Change Flyer Riding and Enable Flyer Riding. This will allow you to use the maps default setting, or enable/disable flyer riding on your server. Using the map default will remove the bForceCanRideFliers setting from your config file, otherwise it will set to TRUE or FALSE.
Added coloring to the grids for Valgeuro and Genesis DLC.
Player and Dino levels have been updated.
Chibi Player levels are now highlighted (like ascension was), the note message has been updated with additional information about the levels.
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Stack Size Section - fixed save button on item rows to only save that item, not all items.
Server Settings (Rules) - added new Genesis group with bDisableGenesisMissions and AllowTekSuitPowersInGenesis settings.
Server Settings (Structures) - put GenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes setting into Genesis group for clarity.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file updated. (thanks @bruno5011)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated.
Server Settings (Dinos section) - fixed the bForceCanRideFliers (Enable Flyer Riding (Genesis)) setting, so it clears the value in the gameusersettings.ini file if unchecked.
Server Settings (Stack Sizes) - new section that allows you to manange your individual item stack sizes. Has an option in the global setting to turn on/off.
Server Settings (Administration section -> Server Options)
* -structurememopts (Structure Memory Optimizations)
* -noundermeshchecking (No Under Mesh Checking)
* -noundermeshkilling (No Under Mesh Killing)
Server Settings (Rules section)
* FuelConsumptionIntervalMultiplier
* LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsRange
* LimitNonPlayerDroppedItemsCount
Server Settings (Players section)
* MaxFallSpeedMultiplier
Server Settings (Dinos section)
* bForceCanRideFliers (Enable Flyer Riding (Genesis))
Server Settings (Structures section)
* AlwaysAllowStructurePickup
* StructurePickupTimeAfterPlacement
* StructurePickupHoldDuration
* AllowIntegratedSPlusStructures
* bGenesisUseStructuresPreventionVolumes (Disable Building in Mission Areas (Genesis))
Fix issue with player/tribe linking in RCON window for maps other than Genesis, introduced in v351.
Fix issue with player/tribe linking in RCON window.
Added the Valguero gamedata file to the install.
Added the Genesis gamedata file to the install.
Added new player ascension levels to gamedata file.
Added player ascension level value to the gamedata file. Player levels will now use this value to highlight the last set of player level rows.
Server File Details - Fixed a crashing bug caused by having a steamid that is not available or does not exist. (thanks @bastogne)
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
pt-BR Translation file added. (thanks @bruno5011)
Mod Details Window - Added a new button to the top to open the server's mod folder.
Fixed a crash with Ark Server Manager when validating the mods.
Official Mods - moved the official mods to the gamedata files, for easy future updates.
Mod Form - fixed mod purge button to use the new official mods from the gamedata, will no longer remove Valguero map DLC.
Dino Grid - set default mod name to Unknown, not blank.
Dino Grid - fix a bug that would stop saving certain dinos to the GAME.ini file.
Updated Extinction gamedata file - updated DINONAMETAG values, so spawns changes should now be possible (thanks Baradine Allawa).
Game Map droplist - moved TheIsland map to the gamedata file.

p.font: WARNING: Before you restart your servers, check that the Map Name is set correctly.

ul.li: fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Dino, Engram and Resource Grids - fixed bug where the Mod column would not be updated when changing languages.
Auto Update - Have added a delay settings to the auto-update for Sequential processing. The delay is in seconds (default 0) and will wait that number of seconds between each server update.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Main Window - Start position changed to 50,50.
Settings Window - changed the filter drop lists to show the Mod name. The list is now dynamic and will display mods from your own custom gamedata files.
Server Status - removed server status call to offline WEB API.
Updated Extinction gamedata file - found a few missing items.
Dinos - Crafting skill has been re-enabled.
Language files - Have added Mod Name to the language files.
Drop Lists - Mod Name is now listed first (if specified) in the item description.
Updated Extinction gamedata file - contains all the DLC content.

p.font: NOTE: You are unable to change the Extinction dino spawns at the moment. The DEVKIT needs to be updated for those changes.

ul.li: Added Extinction gamedata file - only contains the map name for now.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
MotD Interval - fixed the bug when enabling the MotD interval.
Profile Import - fixed the profile import, so that any INI file can be imported.
Profile Import - fixed the dialog window opening twice.
Out-Of-Date Mods - Fixed bug that would keep updating mod status when changing profiles.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Dino Inventory - Added Medium and Hard variants of Spider and Gorilla Bosses.
Auto-Shutdown/Restart - Have added days of week, so you can schedule your server to shutdown on one or more days.
RCON Window - removed right-click KILL command.
Server Files - Disabled file watcher when saving server files. Prevents double loading.
Config Files - changed the output of float numbers to 6 decimals.
Mod Details - when the steam fetch fails, basic mod details are read from the local workshop cache file, if one exists.
Mod Details - grid background changed to blue, if mod record is invalid.
Mod Details - grid background changed to blue, if mod details could not be downloaded from steam. Private mods and mod that have been removed from steam workshop.
Mod Details - added mod fetch status message if failed.
Out of Date Mods - changed to exclude mods that are invalid (no steam information).
Rcon Window - changed the order the server status and player list is started.
Rcon Window - added null reference checking for send command results.

Scheduled Tasks folder name - fixed the folder name back to ArkServerManager.
NOTE: This change will require you to delete all your existing tasks under the 'ServerManager' folder in Windows Task Scheduler. Then you can use ASM to recreate them.
To recreate, open the Global Settings and close it. Then click save on all your profiles. Once done, all the scheduled tasks will be recreated.
Translations - Fixed the map name, total conversion name and branch names when changing languages.
Server Validation - Fixed the validation when the mod details could not be downloaded from steam.
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated. (thanks @shouke)
en-US translation file - changed PerPlatformStructuresMultiplier tooltip to include 'Raft'.
Processor Affinity - fixed bug with machines that have more than 32 processors.
Processor Affinity - removed code that checks the LauncherArgs for Affinity. Affinity can be set using the Affinity window, or the LauncherArgs.
Engram Sync - fixed bug witht he engram sync.
Fix the bug when generating the support zip file.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
Fixed bug that prevented ASM from starting.
Message of the Day - fixed the saving of the message of the day.
Profile Tabs - added server status indicator buttons to the profile tabs for quick reference and ability to Start/Stop the server.

Server Status Options - added two new options to the global settings.
1. Enable Server Status Actions - will enabled/disable to ability to perform an action when clicking on the server status icon.
2. Show Server Status Action Confirmation - will enabled/disable the display of a confirmation dialogue when an action is performed.
fr-FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ru-RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
zh-CN Translation file updated. (thanks @shouke)
MotD Duration Label - fixed motd duration label format.
Global Settings - fixed shutdown command option tooltip.
Log folder creation - added exists check when creating the Logs folder.

li.font: DotNet Framework updated to 4.6.2. This means Windows OS versions from Vista and earlier will no longer work.

p.font: NOTE: There is a new version of the Discord plugin - 1.0.12.1.

ul.li: Duplicated comma bug - attempt #2 fixing the duplicate comma bug.
Duplicated comma bug - fixed the duplicate comma bug.
Process Priority and Processor Affinity - added new priority and affinity entry fields.
Server Status spamming - attempt to fix the server status spam being sent to the discord plugin.
Server Stop process - changed the way the server stop process is done. It is now all threaded properly and should now close down the server within 30 seconds.
Server Status - when performing the manual update, the 'Updating' server status should now remain until the update process is complete. This will also keep the update and start buttons disabled.
RCON Window - changed player leaving message color to MidniteBlue.
Import Profile - now imports to the current profile rather than creating a new profile and overwriting the current profile.
User Settings - added reading user config settings from json file when loading.
Dino Spawns - fixed the bug that did not set the dino spawn values correctly when reading from INI files.
Player List - fixed bug that would prevent loading the player list if the steam fetch caused a problem.
User Settings - added a user settings backup to the backup folder.
FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
ArkData - some code tweaks
SteamCMD - added a bug fix to reduce the steamcmd error when changing/removing branches.
Icons - all icons have be cleaned up and updated.
Mod Details window - when moving the mods up and down, it no longer updates the mod details. Only adding new mods will update the details.
Message of the Day - Added a new Lines count. Will let you know how many lines the MotD is, and will turn red when you have exceeded the visible space in game.
RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
Engrams - fixed bug that would clear the selected engrams.
Dinos - fixed bug that would clear the dino spawn multipliers.

Beta branch support now added to the server manager and works with the Manual and Auto update processes.
NOTE: This change affects the server cache and will force your server to perform an update when the next auto-update is run.
Profiles - added global options to enable/disable ASM controlling PGM and SotF settings (default disabled).
FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
RCON Window - text is now colored dependant on what type of message is being displayed.

RCON Player List - list is now loaded in two parts. The first part will load the online players only and displays only basic information (Steam Name and Steam Id). The second part will read the player and tribe profile files and requests player data from steam. Then they are merged together.
RCON Player List - removed players from list when the player profile no longer exists (eg. cluster transfer).
Player List - synchronized the method of reading the player and tribe profile files with the RCON player list. This list will take longer to display results as it is not able to show online players.
Player List - removed players from list when the player profile no longer exists (eg. cluster transfer).

p.font: NOTE: Player Avatars Images will only load if you have less than 300 player profiles. If you have more than 300 player profiles then you will only see the ? image. The reason is because the player avatar images are what is causing the lag and freezing. 300 profiles is about the limit when the performance starts to degrade.

ul.li: Fixed a few duplicate shutdown messages introduced with the Always Show Shutdown Reason in last release (322).
Version Details Window - a new window to show the version updates.

Player List window - a new window only available when RCON is disabled, replaces the RCON button with a Players button.
The player list only reads the ARK player and tribe files and displays them in a list. Without RCON I am unable to determine which player is online, so Online status is never shown here.
Right-click on a player to get a few options.
This list is only designed to give server owners WITHOUT RCON, the ability to see who is connecting to their server.
Added global setting to shutdown or keep open the Server Shutdown window after it is finished - used for testing.
Gamedata storage changes

Completely re-wrote the RCON player profile load.
It will only call the update one at a time - should remove the ListPlayers spam.
It should not freeze ASM when the profiles are now loading.
RU Translation file updated. (thanks @varlonec)
FR Translation file updated. (thanks @angemymy)
The auto-update now has a file copy failure retry. If the file fails to copy, it will try 3 times with a 5 second delay in between.
The Server Files section is now read-only when the server is running.
The Server Files section is now an option in the Profile Sync.
The Shutdown window will now always open regardless of if RCON is enabled/disabled.
Added Server, Query and RCON port validation to the profile validation. Valid range is 0 - 65535.
Added the .arktributetribe files to the backup and restore functions.
Added a onfirmation dialog when using the Write Timestamp button in the Mod Details window.
The ArkApplication filter comboboxes have been changed, so that the display values can be globalized.
Mod Details Window - A new 'Timestamp' column has been added to shows the timestamp of the last time the mod was updated. This value is returned from the steam servers.

Mod Details Window - A new button has been added to each row. This button will allow you to manually set the value in the LastUpdatedASM.txt files. This should only be used if you MUST update a mod by manually copying the files.

Shutdown Reason Broadcast - A new option has been added to the global settings, that will broadcast the shutdown reason with every shutdown message. If disabled, the shutdown reason is only broadcast at the start of the shutdown.
Added Aberrant Direbear and Bigfoot versions. (thanks @spikeydragoon)
Updated Ban Url.
